topline_md: A Brooklyn woman was killed in a hit-and-run by a Tesla driver, while a New York man was arrested for murdering his parents after confessing on TV; additionally, ICE has been actively arresting immigrants in New York amid ongoing public safety concerns.

emergencies_risks.title: Emergencies & Risks
emergencies_risks.summary_md:
